title: GO
description: Go is an ancient Chinese board game that I've been playing for six years. I consider myself an average player. My interest in Go began after hearing about AlphaGo, the A.I. that famously beat a world champion.

title: Bass Guitar
description: I've been playing bass guitar for seven years. I love playing punk and metal songs. My favorite bands are RHCP, RATM, and Tool.

title: Reading
description: I love reading books. My favorite genres are Si-Fi, Fantasy, and Mystery.

title: Movies and Series
description: I love watching series. My favorite series are Game of Thrones, Breaking Bad, and The Witcher.
